extensionDescription.message: Captures the web page into local storage and manages captured pages in browser sidebar. Compatible with ScrapBook documents.

STEP1_TEXT_1.message: Download ScrapBee backend executable and 2 installation files to"{FIREFOX_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY}/scrapbee/", by just click on the button below.

STEP1_TEXT_2.message: You maybe meet problem that Firefox does not download the 3 files correctly, then you can close Firefox and remove files under"{FIREFOX_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY}/scrapbee/", start Firefox and download again. (Please use standard version of {Firefox} 60 and later)

STEP2_TEXT_1.message: Run the installation script downloaded above manually:

STEP2_TEXT_2.message: Run the commands in your terminal:

STEP2_TEXT_3.message: You maybe need to run the script as administrator

RDF_FILES_TIP.message:
Set absolute path of RDF files(ending with extension '.rdf') to register information of scraps, downloaded scraps will be saved in "data" folder beside the RDF files.

For example: c:\scrapbee\test.rdf (Windows)    /home/userID/scrapbee/test.rdf (Linux)    /Users/userID/scrapbee/test.rdf (Mac)

You can setup multiple RDF files to classify your scraps.
You can have multiple RDF files inside same directory.
No need to create these files maunally(Some XML tags are needed for an empty RDF file).
For ScrapBook user: ScrapBook RDFs are also supported.

Click on the '+' button below to register a new RDF, input an alias into 'Name' and absolute file path into 'File'

BACKEND_PORT_TIP.message: TCP port ScrapBee backend service listens. e.g. 9900

COLOR_TIP.message:
Change color of some elements to make ScrapBee a better looking.
These colors should be in format: #FFFFFF or #FFF

OPEN_IN_CURRENT_TAB_TIP.message:
By default, ScrapBee opens each scrap in new tab while clicking on an entity,
and open scraps in current tab by holding control(meta for Mac) while doing click, this also can be done with a middle mouse button clicking.
You can reverse this by turn on this option.

DONATE_WORDS.message:
To make ScrapBee grows better,
your donations are very welcome,
thanks for your support !!!
Also, please rank 5 stars if you like ScrapBee

ConfirmDeleteDirectory.message: This is a folder, do you really want delete it and items within it?

SAME_RDF_MODIFIED.message: Same RDF modified, click OK to refresh

announcement_content.message:
#1.7.10#
  • Add tree item sorting, see content menu of sidebar

    • #1.7.9#
  • Change name 'Initiate' to be 'Install', 'Settings' to be 'Configure'
  • Enable capture local HTML pages

    • #1.7.8#
  • Enable open item in current tab with middle click (see {Setting}->{Behavior}->{OPEN_IN_CURRENT_TAB})
  • Enable change order of RDF settings

    • #1.7.6#
  • Try new storage solution to pervent settings losing, PLEASE REDO SETTINGS AT FIRST
  • Fix problem that the port does not switch at once after port setting changed
  • Add line breaks after each tag in RDF file

    • #1.7.2#
  • Improve 'highlight red frame' of page cleaner
  • Improve tree render
  • For Windows user mainly: host an unpacked backend executable (to satisfy defender) in github.com now, please re-download
  • Fix empty help page for some user

    • #1.7.0#
  • An experimental tool named "{Node Mover}" added, backend need to be updated for it (check backend version in log), please backup your data before trying this tool, please let me know if you like or feel it useless

    • #1.6.0#
  • Fixed problem about it can not finish capture sometime
  • Backend updated, please re-download and install backend to get full features(less malware fake alarm and more error checking)

NODE_MOVER_TIP.message: With this tool, you can move or copy nodes and their contents between 2 RDFs (book trees), draging nodes within one RDF is also available here.

NODE_MOVER_WARN_TIP.message:
BE CAREFUL!!! THIS IS AN EXPERIMENTAL-FEATURE.
Please make sure you'v backup your data before using this tool.
Actions on heavy nodes are not recommended.
Do not make changes anywhere else while using this tool or it possibly causes conflicts.

STORAGE_WARN.message: For now, ScrapBee need local storage enabled to keep settings, please turn off storage cleaning to prevent settings losing if you'v turned it on

ConfirmSorting.message: This process can not be reverted, proceed?
